INSERT INTO t_stock_application_in_record ( id, ware_house_id, goods_id,goods_spec_id,apply_number,stock_application_id, price,create_user_id,create_time,box_id,enterprise_id,sort, currency ) VALUES
( #{item.id},#{item.wareHouseId},#{item.goodsId},#{item.goodsSpecId},#{item.applyNumber},#{item.stockApplicationId}, #{item.price},#{item.createUserId},now(),#{item.boxId},#{item.enterpriseId},#{item.sort}, #{item.currency} )

update.foreach:
update t_stock_application_in_record
count = #{item.count},
residual_number = #{item.residualNumber},
ware_house_id = #{item.wareHouseId},
where goods_spec_id = #{item.goodsSpecId} and stock_application_id = #{item.stockApplicationId}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_stock_application_in_record where create_user_id = #{createUserId} and stock_application_id = #{stockApplicationId} and enterprise_id =#{enterpriseId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.ware_house_id wareHouseId, r.goods_id goodsId, r.goods_spec_id goodsSpecId, r.count, r.apply_number applyNumber, r.stock_application_id stockApplicationId, r.residual_number residualNumber, r.price, wh.name wareHouseName, gs.x, gs.y FROM t_stock_application_in_record r LEFT JOIN t_goods_spec gs on gs.id = r.goods_spec_id LEFT JOIN t_ware_house wh on wh.id = r.ware_house_id WHERE r.stock_application_id = #{stockApplicationId} ORDER BY r.sort ASC

SELECT * FROM ( (SELECT sum(tsair.residual_number) as residual_number,sum(count) as count,g.id as goods_id,g.goods_name,g.goods_photos,g.goods_no,gt.name, tsair.goods_spec_id,tsair.create_time,ifnull(t.goods_unit,g.goods_unit) as goods_unit,'1' as stock_type,tsair.ware_house_id,tsair.id,tsair.stock_application_id,u.name as check_user_name, tsair.price,t.biz_type,t.receiver_name,t.receive_address,t.remark from t_stock_application_in_record tsair left JOIN t_stock_application t on tsair.stock_application_id = t.id left JOIN t_user u on u.id = t.check_user_id left JOIN t_goods g on tsair.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type gt on g.goods_type_id = gt.id where t.status = '1'and t.stock_type = '1' and tsair.ware_house_id = #{wareHouseId} group by tsair.stock_application_id ) UNION ALL (select null as residual_number,sum(count) as count,g.id as goods_id,g.goods_name,g.goods_photos,g.goods_no,gt.name, tsaor.goods_spec_id,tsaor.create_time,ifnull(t.goods_unit,g.goods_unit) as goods_unit,'2' as stock_type,tsaor.ware_house_id,tsaor.id,tsaor.stock_application_id,u.name as check_user_name, tsaor.price,t.biz_type,t.receiver_name,t.receive_address,t.remark from t_stock_application_out_record tsaor left JOIN t_stock_application t on tsaor.stock_application_id = t.id left JOIN t_user u on u.id = t.check_user_id left JOIN t_goods g on tsaor.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type gt on g.goods_type_id = gt.id where t.status = '1' and t.stock_type = '2' and tsaor.ware_house_id = #{wareHouseId} group by tsaor.stock_application_id ) ) ss order by ss.create_time desc

select r.id, r.goods_id as goodsId, r.goods_spec_id as goodsSpecId, sum(r.residual_number) as totalResidualNumber, sum(r.price * r.residual_number) as totalPrice, g.goods_photos goodsPhotos, g.goods_name goodsName, g.goods_no goodsNo, gt.name as goodsTypeName from t_stock_application_in_record r LEFT JOIN t_stock_application t on t.id = r.stock_application_id LEFT JOIN t_goods g on g.id = r.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type gt on gt.id = g.goods_type_id where r.ware_house_id = #{wareHouseId} and (r.box_id is null or r.box_id = '') and t.`status` = '1' and t.is_delete = '0' GROUP BY goods_id
